arts.sum: Werder Bremen secured a 1-0 victory against VfL Bochum thanks to Mitchell Weiser's late goal, extending their winning streak to four Bundesliga matches and dealing a blow to Bochum's survival hopes. Mitchell Weiser scored the only goal of the game.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen win their fourth straight following victory over VfL Bochum
arts.sum: The European dream is very much on for Werder Bremen.

arts.ttl: Bochum boss confirms defender Bernardo wants to leave
arts.sum: Newly appointed VfL Bochum personnel boss Dirk Dufner has confirmed that Brazilian defender Bernardo wishes to depart the club after the season.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen sign captain Marco Friedl to contract extension
arts.sum: SV Werder Bremen confirmed a contract extension for captain Marco Friedl on Friday.

arts.ttl: Werder announce contract extension for Friedl
arts.sum: Marco Friedl has extended his contract with Werder Bremen.

arts.ttl: Bochum’s Myron Boadu’s reinstated, start for young talent Mats Pannewig beckons
arts.sum: VfL Bochum trainer Dieter Hecking confirmed that Dutch striker Myron Boadu had been rehabilitated and is a candidate for the starting XI this weekend whilst speaking at his Thursday press conference. Hecking also spoke on the starting prospects of a player drawing a lot of attention in German footballing circles.

arts.ttl: Captain Friedl extends stay | SV Werder Bremen
arts.sum: SV Werder Bremen have secured a longer stay for a vital member of the team. Marco Friedl has extended his contract with the club and will continue to lead the team out as captain in the years ahead. Head of professional football Peter Niemeyer made the announcement on Friday.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen’s Felix Agu attracts interest from Fulham and West Ham United
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that two London-based EPL sides are interested in Werder Bremen wingback Felix Agu.
